snippet: When those waiting to visit a scenic lake learned that the arrival of top officials was to blame for an hours-long delay, they surrounded and blocked the officials’ cars.
abstract: Thousands of people demonstrate and surround a government entourage that blocked their entry to a popular nature preserve in northeastern China; police officers and soldiers beat recalcitrant protesters, some of whom demand refunds for their entry tickets to the preserve and chant anti-government slogans.
lead_paragraph: When those waiting to visit a scenic lake learned that the arrival of top officials was to blame for an hours-long delay, they surrounded and blocked the officials’ cars.

headline.seo: In China, Long Wait Leads to Standoff with Officials
headline.main: In China, Wait Leads to Standoff With Officials
headline.print_headline: In China, Wait Leads To Standoff With Officials
